name: Drops: Learn Danish language and words for free
description: What if  Danish language learning would become a crazy fun game instead of the boring and old memorization techniques? With Drops, Danish language learning becomes an effortless and super fun game. Practical Danish vocabulary is cemented into your memory thanks to our beautiful images and quick mini-games. The surprising part? You only need 5 minutes Danish language practice a day! Sounds counterintuitive but it works like magic and youll be a Danish vocabulary pro in no time! :)   Heres our secret sauce for its success:    100% illustrated: Pictures identify a meaning right away You no longer have to analyze its translation through your native language. Making your Danish language learning process faster and more effective in an extremely fun way.    5 min sessions: Limited practice sessions might sound counter-productive, but it is what makes it incredibly addictive! A cool thing when it comes to learning, huh? You cant have any excuses to skip your Danish vocabulary learning practice anymore!    Effortless play: Drops essence is learning in a game-type setting that is addictive. Why? Because while you are playing you also get a truly immersive Danish language learning experience that is definitely a good investment of your valuable time since you get to build your Danish language knowledge.   Quick: Skip the painfully slow keyboard typing, and say hello to taps and rapid swipes! Every second counts during the quick Danish language learning session, and youll surely need that during the game. :)    Vocabulary only: No grammar, only curated practical Danish words that you can use in everyday situations. This is our main focus and we are extremely good at it.   Forge a habit: We want to make you an addict to Danish language learning with Drops. Effectiveness is irrelevant without an established habit, but with Drops, we help you build that habit too.   We are proud of our Danish word pronunciations by our seasoned and professional Danish voice talents.   Drops is FREE for everyone with more than 1700 Danish words in 99 topics (and we are continuously growing our list of words, by the way). Hardcore Danish language learners however, can easily opt-in to our premium plans to have unlimited learning time and progress faster. Plans starts at $2.99 monthly.    Language knowledge is our goal here for people around the world, and we do it by providing a tool that uses the universal language that we all can speak: pictures!   P.S. Be careful though, Drops can really get you addicted to learning the Danish language. :)   ________________________________________   If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com
